author: luebbe
msg: Updated German translation.
* po/de.po: sorted .pot file by source filename, causes lot of changes in de.po
Added many new translations

author: ghudson
msg: Make FSFS transaction creation a little more elegant, and clean up a
couple of loose ends in "structure".
* libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(create_txn_dir): New function, uses similar logic to
svn_io_open_unique_file, but creates a directory and doesn't have
the impedance mismatch of using "."s in the path.
(svn_fs_fs__create_next): Use create_txn_dir.
(svn_fs_fs__purge_txn): All we need to do is delete the transaction
directory.
(svn_fs_fs__list_transactions): Don't enforce a path length
restriction on transaction dirs.  (This code was likely broken
before.)
* libsvn_fs_fs/structure: Document the .txn extension for transaction
directories.  Document that empty node-revs can omit the "text"
field.

author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #1840:  make ra_dav->get_dated_revision() work on URLs not in HEAD.
* libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (svn_ra_dav__get_dated_revision): run the
custom 'dated-rev-report' on the VCC url, which is always guaranteed
to exist.

author: sussman
msg: * notes/locking-design.txt:  add some brainstorms from IRC discussions.

author: cmpilato
msg: * tools/examples/svnshell.py
(SVNShell.do_cat): Do stream reads/writes of file contents.
